'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 10''' is the tenth {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*46. Defeat the Swamp Brewing King! (沼地の醸造王をたおせ!!, ''Numachi no Jōzō-Ō o Taose!!'')
*47. Protect Your Friendship! Run Through the Jungle! (守れ友情! 駆けろジャングル!!, ''Mamore Yūjō! Kakero Janguru!!'')
*48. A Sudden False Accusation!? Catch the Real Culprit!! (突然の濡れ衣!? 真犯人を捕まえろ!!, ''Totsuzen no Nureginu!? Shinhan'nin o Tsukamaero!!'')
*49. Mod Sealed!? Rematch with the Plunder King!! (MOD封印!? 略奪王との再戦!!, ''Moddo Fūin!? Ryakudatsu-Ō to no Saisen!!'')
*50. Self-Doubt, Becoming Stronger Through Infinite Trials!! (自信喪失、無限試練で強くなれ!!, ''Jishin Sōshitsu, Mugen Shiren de Tsuyokunare!!'')
